pageProps.title: Advanced NLP with spaCy · A free online course

data.title: Advanced NLP with spaCy · A free online course
data.description: spaCy is a modern Python library for industrial-strength Natural Language Processing. In this free and interactive online course, you'll learn how to use spaCy to build advanced natural language understanding systems, using both rule-based and machine learning approaches.
data.author: Ines Montani
